languages.text: "Я распорядился отдать треть своих имений под бараки для блюстителей. Приведение Даргонуса к благочестию требует жертв от каждого!"

traits.locale_text: "Я распорядился отдать треть своих имений под бараки для блюстителей. Приведение Даргонуса к благочестию требует жертв от каждого!"

languages.text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"
languages.original_text: "Я распорядился отдать треть своих имений под бараки для блюстителей. Приведение Даргонуса к благочестию требует жертв от каждого!"

traits.locale_text: "I ordered to give one third of my houses for overseers' barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety requires everyone's sacrifices!"
"I ordered to give one third of my houses for overseers' barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety requires everyone's sacrifices!"
"I gave the order for one third of my houses to become enforcers barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety requires everyone to sacrifice!"
"I gave the order for one third of my houses to become enforcers barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety requires everyone to sacrifice!"
"I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

languages.text: “我刚刚下了命令，捐出我本人三分之一的房产，把它们改造成执法者的兵营。若想让达戈努斯走上虔诚之路，需要所有人的付出！”
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

traits.locale_text: “我刚刚下了命令，捐出我本人三分之一的房产，把它们改造成执法者的兵营。若想让达戈努斯走上虔诚之路，需要所有人的付出！”

languages.text: « J'ai ordonné qu'un tiers de mes domaines soit transformé en casernes pour les prévôts. Il faut consentir à des sacrifices pour faire régner la piété sur Dargonus ! »
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai ordonné qu'un tiers de mes domaines soit transformé en casernes pour les prévôts. Il faut consentir à des sacrifices pour faire régner la piété sur Dargonus ! »

languages.text: 「私は領地の3分の1をエンフォーサーの兵舎とする命令を下した。ダルゴナスを敬虔に導くには、すべての犠牲が必要なのだ！」
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は領地の3分の1をエンフォーサーの兵舎とする命令を下した。ダルゴナスを敬虔に導くには、すべての犠牲が必要なのだ！」

languages.text: «He dado la orden de que transformen un tercio de mis tierras en cuarteles para el personal de seguridad. ¡Alcanzar la piedad en Dargonus exige sacrificios por parte de todo el mundo!».
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

traits.locale_text: «He dado la orden de que transformen un tercio de mis tierras en cuarteles para el personal de seguridad. ¡Alcanzar la piedad en Dargonus exige sacrificios por parte de todo el mundo!».

languages.text: "Ich habe den Befehl erteilt, ein Drittel meiner Liegenschaften zu Enforcer-Kasernen umzubauen. Wenn Dargonus fromm werden soll, müssen wir alle Opfer bringen!"
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den Befehl erteilt, ein Drittel meiner Liegenschaften zu Enforcer-Kasernen umzubauen. Wenn Dargonus fromm werden soll, müssen wir alle Opfer bringen!"
"Ich habe den Befehl erteilt, ein Drittel meiner Häuser in Enforcer-Kasernen umzubauen. Wenn Dargonus fromm werden soll, müssen alle Opfer bringen!"

languages.text: "Mülkümün üçte birinin infazcı kışlasına dönüştürülmesini emrettim. Dargonus'u inançlı bir yer yapmak için hepimiz fedakârlıkta bulunmalıyız!"
languages.original_text: "I gave the order for one third of my estates to be turned into enforcer barracks. Bringing Dargonus to piety demands sacrifices of all!"
